rounds: This round will be pen-paper test of questions related to database and sql knowledge.
Selected teams will be given attributes and information about database they have to make database in given format and perform given operations on database.
This round will be pen-paper test of questions related to simple programming knowledge.

One of the group member have to choose piece of paper in which secret number will be written. Based on that number participant will be given 1 program out of 12.He/she have to explain it and question might be arise from audience or judge.

Code definition will be given to participant. Two time slots will be given 5 min for thinking and 5 min for codding and this cycle will repeat again and again. Based on time duration judgment will be done.
This round will be pen-paper test of questions related to simple web related knowledge.

It will be based on unique ideas and concepts of websites. All Participants will be asked to write down ideas and concepts for modern websites and unique features that they can think that websites can be developed upon. For example, if one want to write about ideas about Music website, they can list down various features, unique features of their website apart from other music websites. And if they write how to develop it, then it would be plus points.
Participants will be given limited no of tags based on that they have to make web pages.
Pen paper based quiz in which question related to IT companies and recent it news.
Picture perception of Information Technology related persons and logo.
Each participants will be given one IT related topics randomly. Quick quiz to each participant will be done on that particular topic. Participants have to answer on the spot within 3 seconds.
Pen paper based quiz and questions will be related to basic computer network and its components.
Participant will have to make their own computer network including given constrains and network components.
A basic workshop quiz.

Participants need to solve riddles to get to their intended place or solve the problem to get the data directly. Each place hides some data that will be needed to win the game. (Task is to be performed in group of 3 contestants.)

Each participant will be allotted a number at the beginning and others need to find who their partner is according to the answers they get after solving a problem. The answer will give a number determining his/her partner. A participant can only win if he/she finds her partner and they are able to correctly set up the data that they found in the previous round as no single contender will have enough data to complete the problem.
events.tagline: The real treasure is your mind

rounds: A simple basic quiz in all disciplines on engineering

Group discussion on the topic “Digitization: Pros and Cons to Society” and then a selected group of students would make a Humorous advertisement on the given product. (Task is to be performed in group of 3 contestants.)
Enacting of Advertisement in front of Jury. Then a little talk with each member of the group would be done regarding the product as well as latest trends in engineering.
Basics of mechanical clock will be explained.
A kit would be given to the students to disassemble clocks note down the parts their working and reassembly of the clock. (Task is to be performed in group of 3 contestants.)
Jury would interviewed the students related to clocks

There are 20 questions in this, each questions having a different virtual worth just like KBC. In this there are 4 slots of questions. (1-5,6-10,11-15,16-20) Rules:- For 1 to 5 questions ? Each questions having different worth (eg. RS. 100 , RS. 200 ,RS. 500,1K,5K) ?No negative marking. For 6 to 10 questions  Each questions having different worth (eg. 10K , 15K ,20K,25K,30K) (1/10 ) negative marking. For 11 to 15 questions  Each questions having different worth (eg.35K,40K,45K,50K,55K) (1/5) negative marking. For 16 to 20 questions  Each questions having different worth (eg.60K,65K,70K,75K,1lakh) (1/2) negative marking  Top 9 team will be eligible for next round.(Based on virtual highest Rs.)

Circuit Auction will take place in this round. Participants have to take part in virtual auction according to their virtual money earned by first round. Each circuit having a different base price according to its complexity. There is some surprise condition, it will be declared at the time of round. After completing this round only 5 team will be eligible for final round others team will be eliminated.(Based on virtual highest Rs.)

It is purely technical round like hands-on practice. In this participants have to implement circuit on breadboard/PCB which they bought in auction.  It is a bonus round means time based round.  Rule:- According to time consumed for getting proper output. 10min:-RS. 10K will be rewarded in their virtual wallet.  20min:-RS. 5K will be rewarded in their virtual wallet. In case of wrong output bonus reward will be directly subtracted from their wallet.
Crossword, quizzes on basic electronics.
Forming of pairs, performing task like cube solving, and problem solving.

Two teams (four participants each)  •	Semi-Final: Debate between two teams. One team will be selected •	Final: Each participant will be given a truth table of a known digital circuit and the circuit is to be implemented on bread board. (Time based)
A test based on arduino microprocessor.
In this round participants will have to debug the errors from the given codes and then they have to correct the entire code and compile it.
In this round participants will have to interface the given components with arduino. Interfacing Devices like sensors commenly used with Arduino.
Pen paper based basic c-programming quiz leading to circuit completion.
Pen paper based digital circuit quiz, whose output will be the key to your destination.
Treasure hunt.
events.tagline: Bridge the gap with some fun, folks!!

rounds: Participants will be quizzed with logos of different companies and knowledge regarding start-ups and business will be given.
Participants will be given list of Indian companies whose idea is copied from foreign MNC; comparative analysis has to be prepared
Finalists have to search such companies whose idea is copied from foreign MNC, why their idea failed/succeeded in India, and present its analysis.
events.tagline: Nothing is permanent, Change is necessary

rounds: Participants will be given virtual budget; they have to plan their investments and strategy
Company is in saturation stage; you must plan and present your strategy. Company is making very high profit, how will you act further
Company is on verge of bankruptcy, discuss possibilities
1)	Observation Matrix   2) Empathy Matrix   3) Ideation Matrix   4) Product Development
students will be provided with a product, the have to pitch in front of investors. Ideas will be discussed; student’s mistake and flaws will be resolved.
Final panel discussion. Students will be taught how to launch this product
Seminar on scope of entrepreneurship in civil domain
Students have to explore our college and find infrastructure defects and present measures to solve them (Note: make timetable such that 2&3 round are in same day but at interval of 4-5hours)
Expert talk by Shikhar Maheshwari(Entrepreneur from BVM)  on how to initiate start-ups, challenges faced on early stage. Personal experience sharing and Q&A.
Make a Cable Suspension bridge using posicle sticks of the given dimensions.
TECHNICAL QUIZ
TECHNICAL TREASURE HUNT USING THE SURVEYING INSTRUMENT LIKE COMPASS.
events.tagline: Hunt with skills, learning and accuracy of surveying.

rounds: PEN PAPER QUIZ ON HYDROLOGY, WASTE WTAER MANAGEMENT.
PLAN WILL BE GIVEN TO PARTICIPANTS AND ON THAT PLAN THEY WILL HAVE TO                        ARRANGE TWO TYPES OF PIPES(STRAWS) NAMED DRAINAGE PIPE AND INLET PIPE.
events.tagline: Design a pipe system for water management of area.

rounds: Identification of different electrical/electronics devices and GK base quiz on current electrical scenario.
Students will be given different topics from which they have to collect research articles and get surface knowledge of the topic and they will have to submit an abstract on given topic.
Students will be given a topic of electrical domain and finally have to do PPT presentation in front of faculty.
Innovative Technical Crossword Puzzle based on basic electrical terminology.
Treasure hunt based on Electrical Engineering knowledge.
Personal Interview & Devices Identification. (Surprise Round)
events.tagline: Peace be Amplified, World be Rectified !

rounds: Workshop on IC engine
PPT test (questions related to ic engine with 4 options and picture perception of ic engine    components.)
Assemble or dissemble of ic engine.
events.tagline: To know how our vehicle runs.

rounds: Workshop on drafting and modeling software.
Pen paper test related with EG and CAD

Treasure Hunt: find the name of components according to clue given and name the assembly. final clue will be of CAD lab in which they have to assemble given components and make an assembly.[in creo] we can use own laptop as well.
Written test on manufacturing.
Make SOP (Sequence Of Procedure) of given components
Presentation on topics which event managers will deside.
events.tagline: Boost your knowledge related to Manufacturing.

rounds: Written round, elimination. Questions will appear on the screen and participants will have to write the answer.
Stage Round. Theme based Rounds (eg: Indian Heritage, Sports)
Written round, elimination. Questions based on Logical reasoning and thinking out of the box
Devils Advocate. Participants have to justify given personalities in the court.
Personal Interview
events.tagline: Everything you say or do matters

rounds: Written round, elimination. Images of Products will appear on screen, participant has to write creative and apt tag line for the same.
Participants will have to create short 30 seconds advertisement video for a given product.
events.tagline: Everything you say or do matters.
